title: Sitharaman reiterates call for tech and fund transfer on climate, commitment to fighting terror funding - Economic Times
content: Sitharaman reiterates call for tech and fund transfer on climate, commitment to fighting terror funding  Economic Times
description: The finance minister emphasised on "the importance of the multilateral approach to combat climate change and transfer of climate finance and low-cost technologies from developed to developing countries", the ministry of finance posted on Twitter.
